H0.text: the fertile crescent is located between what two bodies of water. Euphrates and Jordan River

H1.text: the fertile crescent is located between what two bodies of water. Nile and Persian Gulf

H2.text: the fertile crescent is located between what two bodies of water. Mediterranean Sea and Red Sea

H3.text: the fertile crescent is located between what two bodies of water. Tigris

A4.text: The western zone around the Jordan and upper Euphrates rivers gave rise to the first known Neolithic farming settlements.

A5.text: In addition to the Tigris and Euphrates, riverwater sources include the Jordan River.
